trans-unit.source: Represents all resources in an XML resource (.resx) file.
The <xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceSet> class enumerates over an <xref:System.Resources.IResourceReader>, loads every name and value, and stores them in a hash table.
You can then enumerate the resources in the <xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceSet> object or retrieve individual resources by name.

This class contains a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> and an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> at the class level that applies to all members.
A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> exception is thrown when the immediate caller or a derived class does not have full-trust permission.
A <xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceSet> object provides a convenient way to read all the resources in a .resx file into memory.
You can use the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceSet.GetObject%2A> method to retrieve a particular resource when the .resx file has been read into a <xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceSet> instance.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.ResXResourceSet"></xref> class using the system default <xref href="System.Resources.ResXResourceReader"></xref> to read resources from the specified stream.
The <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> of resources to be read.
The stream should refer to an existing resource file.

Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Resources.ResXResourceSet"></xref> class using the system default <xref href="System.Resources.ResXResourceReader"></xref> that opens and reads resources from the specified file.
The name of the file to read resources from.
Returns the preferred resource reader class for this kind of <xref href="System.Resources.ResXResourceSet"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the preferred resource reader for this kind of <xref href="System.Resources.ResXResourceSet"></xref>.
Returns the preferred resource writer class for this kind of <xref href="System.Resources.ResXResourceSet"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the preferred resource writer for this kind of <xref href="System.Resources.ResXResourceSet"></xref>.
